attributes.action: Remove Foreign Secretary David Miliband from office after SKY News Interview
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Foreign Secretary David Miliband, should be removed from office after the arrogant manner in which he conducted his interview with Adam Boultons The sheer arrogance of this Minister.who still does not understand why we the ordinary people are so disgusted by their actions especially the Labour Ministers who are still saying they acted within the rules, again and again
